There is still time for you to tailor announcements about the date and hour these
leaders in the cultural, political and artistic world will appear on your ■
kilocycles. Use the fine stories the Lowell Institute provided, and adapt them
to your own situation and news media. (Newspapers don’t like dittos - retype the
whole sheet - don’t just fill in the blanks.) Pull material from the brochures
and work it into a couple of paragraphs for local release. (Have these men visited
you before? Do they have friends, relatives, former students on your campus?) By
doing so you help build an audience for your distinguished guests, your station
and for your Association which makes these offerings possible.
Bill Bender, WUOM
(for the Public Relations Policy Committee)
